solution_line_template: The laboratory spent {test_tube_fraction_numerator} / {test_tube_fraction_denominator} * {flask_cost} = {intermediate_product} / {test_tube_fraction_denominator} = $<<{test_tube_fraction_numerator}/{test_tube_fraction_denominator}*{flask_cost}={test_tube_cost}>>{test_tube_cost} on test tubes.
They spent a further {test_tube_cost} / {safety_gear_divisor} = $<<{test_tube_cost}/{safety_gear_divisor}={safety_gear_cost}>>{safety_gear_cost} on safety gear.
Thus, {initial_budget} - {total_spent} = $<<{initial_budget}-{total_spent}={remaining_budget}>>{remaining_budget} of the laboratory's budget remained.
